title: Mi 5X 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV: 1U, Remote Control: 1U, Manual & Warranty Card: 1U, Stands: 2U, Screws: 4U
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, News, Movie, Game, Custom, 5 Band Equalizer
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Help, Miracast, YouTube, Play Movies, Play Store
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: PatchWall 4 with IMDb Integration, Universal Search, Kids Mode with Parental Lock, Language Universe, Smart Recommendations, User Centre, 75+ LIVE Channels and Mi Home - Control Xiaomi IOT Devices on TV Screen
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty and 2 Years for Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details:
The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top
The wall mount is not provided free of cost and is chargeable to the customer
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports also of accessories
Understanding your new TV's features and settings with complete demonstration
Quick run-through on how to operate the TV
The cost of wall mount is Rs. 499 (inclusive of applicable taxes) and is carried by Technician
All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken
Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost

product_description.Premium Metal Bezel-less Design: The Mi TV features a screen-to-body ratio of 96.6% that offers almost a full-screen, distraction-free visual experience. Also, its premium metal design adds beauty to your home.
product_description.30 W Powerful Speakers with Dolby Atmos: You can listen to detailed, clear, and deep sounds, thanks to the 30 W speakers with Dolby Atmos technology.

review:
Review update on 06/03/2022
Received software update few days back , sound is good and audio quality has improved , lagging has reduced 👍
Mi TV 5x 55” delivered on 09/09/2021 & installed on 10th , everything was smooth , TV has a good rich feel with near bezel less Metal frame design , the new adaptive brightness feature is really good , adjusts according to our room lighting making viewing pleasant to eyes , ok google works well , audio is ok not great , some apps volume is good but apps like Apple TV+ have to rise volume to 60 , panel is VA , so contrast is good has good viewing angle up to 120 D after that you will loose color & contrast , other things will update after some days of usage
After 10 days of usage - facing lag in certain apps , loading is also slower , mi needs to update its software , wish mi used Android 11
After 3 weeks
Received Appletv+ app update , now the sound is better , mi needs to update software, lag still persists in certain apps , slow booting & have to improve Wi-Fi connectivity
Very good TV. Decent picture quality and sound effect. Value for money. I am just expecting this TV to work for 4 years.

Pros:
1. Picture quality is perfect(I think it is better than its competitors at this price range)
2. 4k videos can play perfectly fine.
3. Bezels are thin.(for people who don't like thick bezels it's a perfect tv).
4. Patchwall looks good

Cons:
1. The biggest con of this tv is SPEAKERS. I have got 43" tv which has 30 w speakers (believe me my old CRT tv can produce better sound than this). I think all those Dolby Atmos and stuff are gimmicks. If sound is ur mail priority don't go for this tv. If u have a soundbar then it's fine.
2. Observed some stutters occasionally, I think it's due to the software. Hope they can fix it via software update.
3. Sd to hd upscaling isn't upto mark,it could have been better.(if u have a sd settopbox try upgrading it to hd one).
4. Farfield mic is a gimmick(It will work fine when u r closer, but it can't work properly if u are further).

Posting this review after using this TV for 8 days..

1.Picture quality is just awesome. Every pixel is clear.4k 8k videos just gives you awesome feel.

2.Sound quality is better than previous MI 20w speakers, Sound is loud as this TV having 40w speakers but I am not happy with bass of these speakers. Should have more bass with this price range.

3.Connectivity is good. I am using with 200mbps wifi. Remote is smooth and Google assistant is working excellent.

4. Patchwall and other features are good which gives some nice UI experience.

Overall I am happy with MI 5X TV.

It is a brilliant tv at this price point. It has all the features I was looking for and met and exceeded my expectations in some areas, see below for a detailed review of the Mi TV 5X 55 inch:

Picture quality

All the bells and whistles apart, picture quality is the most important thing when you look for a tv. The picture quality on this is tv natively is decent because android tv doesn’t do a great job at picture quality, but I have hooked it up to an Apple TV 4K and it brings out the best from this TV, the picture quality is brilliant with 4K Dolby Vision turned on. Don’t believe the negative reviews because to get a good output you need good input, so if you like to see the full potential of the tv invest in a fire stick 4K or Apple TV, you won’t regret it! 👍 however I don’t recommend watching this TV on the native android OS mode! 😉
Blacks are pretty good too and please don’t make the stupidity of comparing this to an OLED tv because you have to look at the price point and value for money. Colours are vibrant and clarity is great but you will have to tweak the settings a bit to achieve this, will take you about 2 mins!
Viewing angles are good and the screen does show some distortion in colour when you see it from a steep angle but no one would watch tv from such extreme angles so don’t worry about it! 👍


Sound quality

The speakers do a great job producing crisp sound and great surround effect with Dolby Atmos and surround sound turned on. You can’t expect a lot of bass from tv speakers but there is a hint of bass. Dialogues sound crisp and lively, music surrounds you with great clarity. Invest in a good Dolby Atmos enabled soundbar to enjoy the full potential of the TV’s sound.

Connectivity

There are 3 HDMI 2.1 ports and one of them is an e-Arc enabled port. I have connected an Apple TV 4K and a PS4 to the tv and both work flawlessly. It supports both 2.4 and 5ghz Wi-Fi networks. The built in chromecast works flawlessly too.

Gaming

The tv has auto low latency mode and since it has HDMI 2.1 ports, gaming experience is great and lag free. Colors are amazing and the edge to edge screen elevates your experience a notch high! You will love it! 😉

Features

Dolby Atmos, Dolby vision, HDR 10 all work as advertised on Netflix, prime video, Hotstar etc. Again I would like to stress, use a good input device like the fire stick 4K or the Apple TV 4K to truly enjoy these features in this tv.
Saying OK Google triggers the Google assistant instantly as the far field mics on the tv are brilliant no matter which input mode you are on! You can switch it off if you don’t want it on.👍
The auto brightness sensor works well too adapting itself to the light around.


Design

The design of the this tv is stunning and feels very premium!
The screen is edge to edge and feels much bigger than it already is. It is very slim and looks great whether you wall mount it or place it on the sturdy metal stands provided in the box.

Summary

Overall this TV has been a great buy for me as it met all the expectations I had and exceeded on some! If you are in the market for a good looking tv with all the latest features and good picture quality your search ends here! 😉
Go ahead and buy it, highly recommended! 👍
